tool_description: Validates that volunteer applicants meet basic organizational requirements including age, location, time commitment, and role-specific qualifications.

applicant_age.description: Age of the volunteer applicant in years

availability_hours.description: Weekly hours applicant can commit to volunteering

role_type.description: Type of volunteer role (youth_services, elderly_care, administration, fundraising, events)

special_skills.description: List of special skills or certifications

error_messages: Invalid age: Age must be between 16 and 100 years
Invalid role type: Use one of [youth_services, elderly_care, administration, fundraising, events]
Insufficient availability: Minimum 2 hours per week required for most roles
Location outside service area: Applicant must be within the organization's geographic service region
usage: Input applicant demographics and preferences to determine if they meet basic eligibility criteria for volunteer positions.

eligible.description: Whether the applicant meets eligibility requirements

eligibility_score.description: Numerical score from 0-100 indicating degree of eligibility

disqualifying_factors.description: List of factors that prevent eligibility

recommended_roles.description: Volunteer roles best suited for this applicant
